StringVectorProperty.name: SelectInputArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates which scalar array contains the array with the global ids of the particles. This is necessary as if data has been redistributed via the data distribution filter or if only certain marked particles were read in, we need the original ordering to know which attributes to read in from the ascii file.

StringVectorProperty.name: AdditionalAttributeFile
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Additional attribute files set are merged into existing input. Only works in serial.

StringVectorProperty.name: AttributeName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Default name is 'additional attribute', but can also specify a custom attribute name here.
